name: Pinball Gladiator
description:
This is a very early prototype for a pinball roguelite game.

CONTROLS:

Left Shift: Brake/Skid

Left Click: Shoot

Left Click Hold: Draw (unimplemented wall creation feature)

Right Click Hold: Flamethrower + Grappling Hook

Spacebar: Launch yourself in direction of cursor at time of launch

WASD: Movement is highly limited unless Braking/Skidding

I am putting it here to get feedback on mechanics/art style/anything really.

Mostly I'm interested in movement mechanic ideas and feedback on the current mechanics, the game world makes it hard to move with accuracy due to the nature of pinball machines, but the idea here is that you have a decent enough amount of control that you don't feel like you're hopelessly running into enemies.
